item.description:
WHAT: Rally in support of HCR6
WHEN: 8:00 AM, Wednesday, March 4th
WHERE: NH State House, 107 N Main St., Concord [ Map ]
WHY:
The Federal government has gone far enough. We need to draw a line in the sand. If there is further egregious, serious disrespect of the US Constitution by the Federal government, then New Hampshire must reclaim its sovereignty.

HCR6 came out of committee with a surprise "Inexpedient to Legislate" recommendation.

For those that remember it, this is a replay of the resistance against the bills to get NH out of Real-ID. We know what it takes to move this forward: MASSIVE PUBLIC SUPPORT!

Folks on Facebook may wish to join the event there, so we can get a better idea of how many people to expect:
http://www.facebook... .com/event. php?eid=61402276 059

Please pass this along!
item.name: Rally in Support of HCR6
